title: BulkOperationsRelationship
description: This schema is used to set relationships for merchant SKUs.

{merchantSku}.description: The merchant SKU that should be affected by the relationships in this object. The {merchantSKU} field should be the merchant SKU that is the parent in the relationship.

merchant_sku_relationships.title: merchantSkuPrice
merchant_sku_relationships.description: The merchant SKU that should be affected by the relationships in this object. The {merchantSKU} field should be the merchant SKU that price is being updated for.

relationship.description:
Variation or Accessory

                    #Logic

                    This field is required if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set merchant SKUs

                    ##Valid Values

                    *Variation

                    *Accessory

variation_refinements.description:
The ID number for the variation that you get from our documentation

                    This field should only be filled in if you are setting up a Variation relationship between a set merchant SKUs and you want to let Jet know what you would like to vary those merchant SKUs on. 
                    
                    #Valid Values

                    The valid 'variation_refinements vary depending on the jet_browse_node_id, see category specific documentation for details

children_skus.description:
The merchant SKUs that are a the child SKUs
                        
                    #Valid Values

                    Must be a merchant SKU that you have sent us
